channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Car out filter seal failed, oil leaked on road and pavement, 1st November
item.description:
Car out filter seal failed, oil leaked on road and pavement . I have used an absorbent to soak up as much as possible but not sure if I should get a de-greaser and scrub the road or if you need to use something special for this.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Maiden Erlegh Avenue, Bexley, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Wet and dry cat food outside front door, 1st November
item.description:
We have new neighbours move (No12) who own cats. They keep their cats outside, so also keep the wet & dry food outside too. However, there are a lot of rats near our estates. We see rats on our first floor quite a lot recently. This is attracting rats.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Seven Sisters Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet
